description: WEBFISHING is a multiplayer chatroom-focused fishing game! Relax and fish (on the web!)

v1.0.0-alpha.description:
> [!CAUTION]  
> This is an alpha version - there may still be bugs and frustrating item logic! Please play at your own risk!
## Initial release
  - All checks are particular quests from the quest board
  - Receivable items:
    - Progressive rod/bait upgrades
    - Lures
    - Consumables
    - Money
  - Customisable win conditions:
    - Reach a target rank
    - Reach a certain percentage journal completion
  - AP button that opens AP connection menu in esc. menu
  - AP chat appears in local chat
v1.0.0-alpha.title: v1.0.0-alpha

v1.1.0-alpha.description:
> [!CAUTION]  
> This is an alpha version - there may still be bugs and frustrating item logic! Please play at your own risk!
## Changelog
- Added an option to exclude "rare" fish quests as checks
- Added an option to equalize all fish weights
- Added a new "streamlined" gamemode, which makes catching specific fish and rarities trivial through a new system
  - Credit goes to Eszenn for the original implementation and for permitting me to integrate the original code
- Added logic so that plenty of upgrades are available before needing to catch any "rare" fish
- Added 3 Progressive Camp Tier Unlock items
- Added a new goal for purchasing all camp tiers
- Added all 5 spectral bones to the item pool
- Added new checks in the spectral bone locations
- Added 4 checks to the progression shop, one for each camp tier
- Added 32 checks to the general shop
- Tweaked more fish quest checks to be classified as "rare", having only one quest-related check
- Tweaked text colours to be less of an eyesore

#### Note that networking issues have not been addressed in this update - these will hopefully come in a follow-up patch
v1.1.0-alpha.title: v1.1.0-alpha

v1.2.0-alphar3.description:
> [!CAUTION]  
> This is an alpha version - there may still be bugs and frustrating item logic! Please play at your own risk!
# Changelog
##  Fixes

- :yellow_square: Fixed world incorrectly interpreting logic

- :green_square: Pressing 'Tab' no longer closes the connect menu, and instead moves to the next text field

- :green_square: Set complete_condition in world

## Tweaks

- :yellow_square: Reduced default no. Generic Catch Quest checks

- :yellow_square: Moved all shop checks to progression shop

## Features

- :red_square: Checks made offline are now recorded and are sent upon reconnection
  - This data is stored per save slot, only while the archipelago mod is installed

- :red_square: Rebalanced 'Streamlined'
  -  Renamed to 'Harmonized' because that's kind of a cool name and better represents the intention of the game mode
  - Rods are now items
    - Spectral rod requires all spectral bones to be received

- :green_square: Added command to view your current % journal completion

- :green_square: Added command to view your current goal/other related data

- :green_square: Added option to toggle shop auto hint (off by default)

- :green_square: Spectral shop has 4 additional checks

# Future Plans..?

- :red_square: Make journal completion goal progress shared between clients for the same slot

- :red_square: Implement 'Fishsanity'

- :yellow_square: Update bait and rod descriptions in Harmonized to display accurate functionalities

- :yellow_square: Stop world item releases from lag spiking

- :yellow_square: Add an option to delete all AP seed save data (it is only a matter of kilobytes though)

- :yellow_square: Rework shop auto hint to show only as checks are unlocked

- :yellow_square: Make shop checks, generic catch quests, and specific catch quests configurable
v1.2.0-alphar3.title: v1.2.0-alpha

v1.2.1-alpha.description:
> [!CAUTION]  
> This is an alpha version - there may still be bugs and frustrating item logic! Please play at your own risk!
# Changelog
- 🟨Spectral bones received through Archipelago that get sold are now automatically reacquired when interacting with the spectral shop

- 🟨 Rod and bait descriptions are now different while 'Harmonized' is active such that they now accurately reflect the updated loot pool
